import { FontAwesomeIcon } from "@fortawesome/react-fontawesome"; import { faFile, faUser, faHotel, faBox, faTruck, faRightToBracket } from "@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons"; import "./SideBar.css"; import { NavLink, useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux"; import { authActions } from "../hook/auth"; import { currentUser, removeFromStorage } from "../hook/lib"; const SideBar = () => { const isAuth = useSelector(state => state.auth.isAuth); const dispatch = useDispatch(); const navigate = useNavigate(); const logoutHandler = () => { dispatch(authActions.logout()); while (currentUser.length > 0) { currentUser.pop(); }; removeFromStorage('currentUser'); navigate('/auth/login'); } return (
